title: Yeahhh... so uh... you know that 'Bring back Baconstripz' thread of mine I made?
body:
http://i.imgur.com/I0GOXbZ.png/img

The GD Wardens took it seriously and he's coming back.

Btw this was written 48 or so minutes ago now, soooooo he's gonna be allowed on here in just a few minutes, _play nice now alrighty?_
